idemeum

Digital identity for the online world

We are on a mission to make digital identity simple, secure, and private.

01

Decentralized

We built idemeum with the goal to give people the power to control and own their digital identity.

We designed idemeum to provide 100% privacy. It means that we do not store any of the user identifiable information in our backend.

Digital identity and all related claims are safely and securely stored on a mobile device. Users can decide what to do with this information and who to share it with.

02

Verified

Trust is fundamental in the online world. Especially in the new normal where everything is remote and virtual.

We designed idemeum to verify person's digital identity and all associated claims. We make sure people are who they say they are.

With the power of idemeum app everyone can decide what information they want to verify and add to idemeum profile.

03

Mobile

idemeum offers an opportunity to always have your digital identity at your fingertips.

When your mobile phone becomes your digital identity you can take it with you to any new job you have, you can use it at any online resource, and you can prove who you are without disclosing more information than you need.

idemeum makes digital identity simple, convenient, and frictionless.

04

Set up idemeum

idemeum is very intuitive and simple to set up. The process is really 1-2-3.

Download app

Download idemeum app from an app store and install it on your mobile device.

Create profile

Create your profile by following the instructions in idemeum application.

Verify claims

Verify digital identity claims such as phone number or driver's license.

Curious to learn more?
